title: Web Applications Developer (intern)
description: Devised 3+ backend services for CLIMS in PHP, Python, and MSSQL, revamping system reliability and cross-team data sharing.
Modernised legacy Delphi applications by migrating features to PHP / JS, reducing technical debt and amplifying maintainability.
Built a custom Excel-style keyboard navigation system, boosting accessibility and tripling data entry and workflow efficiency for the research team.
